feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-16T18:06:30.804837Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;全职</stitle>; <id>;https://www.marginalia.nu/log/83_full_time/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T15:06:07.445662 Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.marginalia.nu/log/83_full_time/"/>; <author>; <name>;kevincox</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=kevincox</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;我今天最后一次离开办公室，这是最奇怪的感觉。我已经辞掉工作，休假，被解雇，但这与这些都不同。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#full-time" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36356876" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Gyroflow：一种基于陀螺仪的开源高级视频稳定工具</stitle>; <id>;http://gyroflow.xyz/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T17:06:07.447249Z< /更新>; <link href="http://gyroflow.xyz/"/>; <author>; <name>;G4E</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=G4E</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http://gyroflow.xyz/src/images/front_page_background.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：141px；" />;<br />;先进的基于陀螺仪的视频稳定工具，适用于电影摄影、无人机摄影等！将您的电影镜头提升到一个新的水平。 Gyroflow 校正镜头畸变并包含一些可自定义的视频平滑算法，包括水平调平，以实现您需要的稳定外观。将陀螺仪源和相机放在一起，您就可以开始了。原生支持来自 GoPro、Insta360、Sony、Runcam、Drone blackbox 等的陀螺仪数据以及高达 16 位的视频处理。具有实时硬件加速视频播放和极速视频导出的跨平台用户界面。是的，它带有暗模式。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gyroflow-an-open-source-advanced-gyro-based-video-stabilization-tool" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36360018" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;来自太空的宇宙辐射激增与地震直接相关</stitle>; <id>;https://www.earth.com/news/从太空直接链接到地震的突破性宇宙辐射浪涌/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T16:06:07.449154Z</updated>; <link href="https: //www.earth.com/news/breakthrough-surges-of-cosmic-radiation-from-space-directly-linked-to-earthquakes/"/>; <author>; <name>;webdoodle</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=webdoodle</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cff2.earth.com/uploads/2023/06 /15080136/earth_earthquake_moon_credit-IFJ_1medium-960x640.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;科学家们已经确定了全球地震活动与宇宙辐射强度变化之间的相关性，这可能有助于地震预测。 CREDO 项目旨在破译宇宙辐射波动与地震之间的联系。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#surges-of-cosmic-radiation-from-space-directly-linked-to-earthquakes" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36358672" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;伊利诺伊州禁止在警察无人机上使用武器和面部识别</stitle>; <id>;https://ilga.gov/legislation/fulltext.asp ?DocName=&SessionId=112&GA=103&DocTypeId=HB&DocNum=3902&GAID=17&LegID=149171&SpecSess=&Session=</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T17:06:07.449648Z</更新>; <link href="https://ilga .gov/legislation/fulltext.asp?DocName=&SessionId=112&GA=103&DocTypeId=HB&DocNum=3902&GAID=17&LegID=149171&SpecSess=&Session="/>; <author>; <name>;Kon-Peki</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Kon-Peki</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;伊利诺伊州大会的立法列表 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io /#illinois-prohibits-weapons-facial-recognition-on-police-drones" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36359296" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Hexyl：带有彩色输出的命令行十六进制查看器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/sharkdp/hexyl</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T17:06:07.450065Z< /updated>; <link href="https://github.com/sharkdp/hexyl"/>; <author>; <name>;hundredwatt</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=百瓦</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sharkdp/hexyl/master/doc/logo.svg" style="width: 220px ; height: 111px;" />;<br />;Hexyl 是一个简单的终端十六进制查看器。它使用彩色输出来区分不同类别的字节。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hexyl- a-command-line-hex-viewer-with-colorized-output" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Reddit 发给版主的便条威胁他们，如果他们不重新开放</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theverge.com/2023/ 6/16/23763538/reddit-blackout-api-protest-mod-replacement-threat</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T17:06:07.451564Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .theverge.com/2023/6/16/23763538/reddit-blackout-api-protest-mod-replacement-threat"/>; <author>; <name>;lewisflude</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=lewisflude</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://duet-cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/0x0:2040x1360/2400x1600 /filters:focal(1020x680:1021x681):format(webp)/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/24720622/acastro_STK024_02.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Reddit 正在联系叛逃者，以取代因抗议 API 更改而关闭社区的版主。该公司向版主发送消息，敦促他们重新打开他们的 subreddits，否则将面临后果。<a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-note-reddit-sent-to-moderators-threating-them-if-they-dont-reopen" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36359259" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;100 天的 Swift – 使用 Swift 进行黑客攻击</stitle>; <id>;https://www.hackingwithswift.com/100</ id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T17:06:07.451960Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.hackingwithswift.com/100"/>; <author>; <name>;sanketpatrikar</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sanketpatrikar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.hackingwithswift.com/uploads/ 100-days-of-swift.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;欢迎来到 Swift 100 天！这是一个免费的视频、教程、测试等合集，旨在帮助您学习 Swift。它面向想要学习 Swift 的初学者构建真正的 iOS 应用。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#100-days-of-swift-hacking-with-swift" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36359652" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;每个工程师都应该知道的烦人的 A/B 测试错误</stitle>; <id>;https://posthog.com/blog/ab-测试错误</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T11:06:07.452733Z</updated>; <link href="https://posthog.com/blog/ab-testing-mistakes"/>; <author>; <名称>;Twixes</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Twixes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:/ /posthog.com/og-images/blogab-testing-mistakes.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;A/B 测试中的第一个常见错误是将实际上并未受到您正在测试的更改影响的用户包括在您的实验中。它稀释了您的实验结果，使其更难确定更改的影响。另一个错误是没有将结果分解为子组，这可能会导致丢失重要的见解。最后，在没有决定应该持续多长时间的情况下开始实验会导致问题，例如过早结束实验或等待结果的时间太长了。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#annoying-ab-testing-mistakes-every-engineer-should-know" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36354280" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Jane Street 的概率与市场 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.janestreet.com/static /pdfs/trading-interview.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T11:06:07.453125Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.janestreet.com/static/pdfs/trading- interview.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;max_</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=max_</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;本文介绍了概率和市场，强调了理解这些概念在我们日常生活中的重要性。它解释了随机性和概率在决策中的作用，并讨论了不同情况下概率的计算。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#probability-and-markets-by-jane-street-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36354259" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;技术供应商在通货膨胀中将价格提高了 24%</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/16 /tech_vendor_price_hikes/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T17:06:07.453503Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/16/tech_vendor_price_hikes/"/>; <author>; <name>;rntn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rntn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://regmedia.co.uk/2015/09/04/dollar_graph_648.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：146px；" />;<br />;通胀压力导致技术供应商将价格提高了 24%。 COVID-19、通货膨胀率上升、能源成本飙升和地缘政治不稳定的影响推动了软件发行商的价格上涨。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tech-vendors-have-been-hiking-prices-by-up-to-24-amid-inflation" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36360035" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Dan Robinson（Heap 前首席技术官）的产品课程</stitle>; <id>;https://johnjianwang. medium.com/product-lessons-from-dan-robinson-ex-cto-of-heap-329a00cd6248</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T17:06:07.454225Z</更新>; <link href="https ://johnjianwang.medium.com/product-lessons-from-dan-robinson-ex-cto-of-heap-329a00cd6248"/>; <author>; <name>;johnjwang</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=johnjwang</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;在 Assembled，我们的使命是培养持续学习的文化。我们一直在邀请创业领域最优秀的人才来分享他们打造成功产品的智慧。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#product-lessons-from-dan-robinson-ex-cto-of-heap" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36359119" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;LiveView 是一个进程</stitle>; <id>;https://fly.io/phoenix-files/a-liveview-is-a -进程/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T11:06:07.454577Z</更新>; <link href="https://fly.io/phoenix-files/a-liveview-is-a-process /"/>; <author>; <name>;clessg</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=clessg</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://fly.io/phoenix-files/2023-06-14/process-cover.webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;LiveView 是一个接收事件、更新其状态并将更新呈现为差异的过程。 LiveView 与其他前端框架的不同之处在于，它是一个进程，而不是操作系统进程或线程。 Elixir 和 Erlang 中的进程轻量级且廉价，它们按顺序执行代码，一次处理一条消息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-liveview-is-a-process" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36339891" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Reddit 似乎正在恢复编辑/删除的评论</stitle>; <id>;https://kbin.social/m/RedditMigration/t/34112/Heads-up-Reddit-is -安静地恢复删除和覆盖帖子和</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T12:06:07.454956Z</更新>; <link href="https://kbin.social/m/ RedditMigration/t/34112/Heads-up-Reddit-is-quietly-restoring-deleted-AND-overwritten-posts-and"/>; <author>; <name>;kaimac</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=kaimac</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://kbin.social/media/cache/resolve/post_thumb/f5/11/ f511e6bb9570e74f911e17d30d6b6b6ac0524b0fc706b75cd0abf8fd67f83430.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：184px；" />;<br />;Reddit 似乎正在恢复已编辑/删除的评论。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reddit-appears-to-be-restoring-edited-deleted-comments" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36354850" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;放一个io_uring——利用Linux内核</stitle>; <id>;https://chompie.rip/Blog+Posts/Put+an+ io_uring+on+it+-+Exploiting+the+Linux+Kernel</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T10:06:07.455343Z</updated>; <link href="https://chompie.rip/Blog+帖子/Put+an+io_uring+on+it+-+Exploiting+the+Linux+Kernel"/>; <author>; <name>;fragmede</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =fragmede</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;在上面放一个 io_uring - 利用 Linux 内核 - chompie <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#put -an-io-uring-on-it-exploiting-the-linux-kernel" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =36353845" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= "text">;一切都必须支付两次（2022）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.raptitude.com/2022/01/everything-must-be-paid-for-twice/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T07:06:07.456426Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.raptitude.com/2022/01/everything-must-be-paid-for-twice/"/ >; <author>; <name>;ColinWright</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ColinWright</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= "https://www.raptitude.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/claudia-rancourt-yEp5-D-JthU-unsplash.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;我们购买的大部分东西都需要支付两次。第一个价格是获得该物品的成本，而第二个价格是获得其收益所需的努力和主动性。仅支付第一个价格就像扔钱一样，因为只有在支付第二个价格时才能获得奖励。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#everything-must-be-paid-for-twice- 2022" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338962" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;OpenSSL 1.1.1 生命周期即将结束</stitle>; < id>;https://www.openssl.org/blog/blog/2023/06/15/1.1.1-EOL-Reminder/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T07:06:07.457161Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.openssl.org/blog/blog/2023/06/15/1.1.1-EOL-Reminder/"/>; <author>; <name>;gslin</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gslin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;OpenSSL 1.1.1 系列将于 2023 年 9 月 11 日结束生命周期 (EOL)。 OpenSSL 1.1.1 的用户应该考虑他们的选择并计划他们可能需要采取的任何行动。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openssl-1-1-1-end-of-life-approaching" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36352547" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PhpBB</stitle>; <id>;https://www.phpbb.com</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T11:06:07.457918 Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.phpbb.com"/>; <author>; <name>;rpastuszak</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= rpastuszak</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;PhpBB 是一个免费的平面论坛公告板软件解决方案，可用于与一群人保持联系或为您的整个网站提供动力。借助用户创建的扩展数据库和包含数百个样式和图像包的样式数据库来自定义您的看板，您可以在几分钟内创建一个非常独特的论坛。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#phpbb" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36354540" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;NHTSA 告诉汽车制造商不要遵守马萨诸塞州的维修权法</stitle>; <id>;https://www.autoblog.com/2023/06/14/us-tells-automakers-not-to-遵守马萨诸塞州独立维修法/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T15:06:07.458297Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.autoblog.com/2023/ 06/14/us-tells-automakers-not-to-comply-with-massachusetts-independent-repairs-law/"/>; <author>; <name>;mistercheph</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=mistercheph</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s.aolcdn.com/dims-global/dims3/GLOB/legacy_thumbnail/1200x675 /quality/85/https://o.aolcdn.com/images/dims3/GLOB/legacy_thumbnail/1062x597/format/jpg/quality/100/https://s.yimg.com/os/creatr-uploaded-images /2023-06/4f208370-0ac5-11ee-8b73-12a7f1a1f465" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;美国汽车安全监管机构以安全问题为由，要求主要汽车制造商不要遵守马萨诸塞州的汽车远程信息处理法。该法律要求开放对汽车远程信息处理和数据的远程访问，允许独立维修店访问诊断数据进行维修。美国国家公路交通安全管理局 (NHTSA) 认为，这种开放访问可能会被恶意行为者利用来远程控制车辆并造成安全风险。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #nhtsa-tells-automakers-not-to-comply-with-massachusetts-right-to-repair-law" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36357415" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;受害者在 Instagram、Facebook 和 WhatsApp 上大声疾呼欺诈的“海啸”</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2023/jun/16/ victims-speak-out-over-fraud-on-instagram-facebook-and-whatsapp</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T17:06:07.458670Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .theguardian.com/technology/2023/jun/16/victims-speak-out-over-fraud-on-instagram-facebook-and-whatsapp"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media /47387f9f14142ce28963837eec48a4f006d0831d/1_0_4998_3000/master/4998.jpg?width=465&quality=85&dpr=1&s=none" style="width: 220px; height: 132px;" />;<br />;社交媒体巨头 Meta 因未能防止 Facebook、Instagram 和 WhatsApp 上的欺诈而面临压力。预计 2023 年英国家庭将因源自 Meta 平台的诈骗损失 2.5 亿英镑. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#victims-speak-out-over-tsunami-of-fraud-on-instagram-facebook-and-whatsapp" target="_blank">;[摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36359508" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml： base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在学术界建立一个新的数据库管理系统</stitle>; <id>;http://www.cs.cmu .edu/~pavlo/blog/2017/03/building-a-new-database-management-system-in-academia.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T12:06:07.459046Z</更新>; <link href="http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~pavlo/blog/2017/03/building-a-new-database-management-system-in-academia.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;greghn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=greghn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http:// www.cs.cmu.edu/~pavlo/images/photo-2023-small.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 307px;" />;<br />;是的，在学术界构建一个新的 DBMS 是可能的。这仍然很难。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-a-new-学术界数据库管理系统" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36354981" target="_blank">; [评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;免费无限存储，存储你在 pi 中的文件 – pi 文件系统</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/philipl/pifs</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T15:06:07.459401Z</updated>; <link href ="https://github.com/philipl/pifs"/>; <author>; <name>;zapdrive</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zapdrive</uri>; < /作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/ee3e3dd9412a767194bbe5b1475e6a49f1f93dae98cc06d89f5237e626751cb3/philipl/pifs" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;πfs 是一个革命性的新文件系统，它将您的数据存储在 π 中，无需硬盘存储。它声称可以保存所有可能存在的文件并提供 100% 压缩。到使用πfs，需要安装一定的包，指定元数据目录和挂载点。π是一个数学常数，有一些有趣的性质，包括猜想它包含所有可能的有限文件。通过在π中查找文件，你可以访问任何文件创建。文件位置作为元数据存储在 π 中，这使得元数据管理很重要。但是，由于在 π 中查找文件序列需要时间，系统可能会很慢。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat. io/#free-unlimited-storage-store-your-files-in-pi-pi-file-system" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36357466" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;我从两年的高中 CS 教学中学到了什么</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.charliemeyer.co/what-i-learned-from-two-years- of-teaching-high-school-cs/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T13:06:07.459741Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.charliemeyer.co/what-i- learned-from-two-years-of-teaching-high-school-cs/"/>; <author>; <name>;csmeyer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=csmeyer </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;在过去的两年里，我与 200 多名学生一起工作，对许多人来说，我的课程是他们第一次体验编码。当我离开教学开始 Pickcode 时，我主要关心的是如何设计产品以吸引更多学生。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-i-learned-from-two-years-of-teaching-high-school-cs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36355172" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Dream inception 有用吗？</stitle>; <id>;https://nautil.us/does-dream-inception-work -311117/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T13:06:07.460091Z</更新>; <link href="https://nautil.us/does-dream-inception-work-311117/"/>; <author>; <name>;dnetesn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dnetesn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://assets.nautil.us/sites/3/nautilus/OneQuestion-logo.png?auto=compress&fit=scale&fm=png&h=127&ixlib=php-3.3.1&w=300&wpsize=medium" style="width: 220px; height : 94px;" />;<br />;因双眼视力障碍而失去阅读能力的威尔·多德探索阅读与做梦之间的联系。他使用名为Dormio的造梦装置模拟阅读体验，发现梦是抗拒控制的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#does-dream-inception-work" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36338474" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
